shows.title: Smiley & The Underclass (solo acoustic set)
shows.desc: George Smiley wants to know: are there any rebels out there? Well, there’s Smiley & The Underclass, for starters. Formed in a caravan below a motorway in 2014, they’re a punky reggae explosion from London. With a growing climate crisis, and social unrest on the cards for the Disunited Kingdom, this is a perfect soundtrack to these chaotic times.

shows.title: The Daily Mirror
shows.desc: Featuring the festival’s smartest thinkers, artists and activists, including you! Cole Moreton helps us look beyond the headlines to try and work out what’s really going on in the world. Come prepared to listen, laugh and have your say.
